actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Research and Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Research and Production

official_title: A joint resolution urging formation of a national policy and renewal of national attention on the future of fusion energy research, technology and development and the possibilities of increased international cooperation in such efforts.

summary.text: States that the Government should: (1) continue its commitment to fusion energy research and technology by establishing a clear set of policies, objectives, and budgets; and (2) promote international cooperation in such efforts.

titles.title: A joint resolution urging formation of a national policy and renewal of national attention on the future of fusion energy research, technology and development and the possibilities of increased international cooperation in such efforts.
